title: ACCOUNT MANAGER
company_info: We are a growing logistics company dealing with ecommerce delivery and last mile delivery.
job_category: Accounting / Auditing / Taxation, General Management, Risk Management
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
SPECIFIC JOB AND RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Manage projects involving complex work streams and cross-functional collaboration
2. Maintain high client retention and satisfaction by providing excellent support and an unwavering willingness to assist partners with any concerns.
3. Upsell current clients and looking for new accounts to bring to the company.
4. Develop new business opportunities with existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement to meet sales quotas
5. Perform forecasts on a monthly, quarterly, and annual basis.
6. Be involved in the monetary workings of accounts and make funding, budgeting, and spending decisions.

TECHNICAL SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES

1. Manage multiple projects with strong attention to detail.
2. Build, manage, and grow relationships and spend with key clients.
3. Develop an understanding of how customers interact in the marketplace; know how the competition relates to clients; and find ways to maintain productive relationships with each client.
4. Negotiate contracts and deals to maximize profits.
5. Manage a company’s budget and payments.
6. Develop strategies for financial growth and focus on achieving company’s financial goals

title: Account Manager
company_info: U3 INFOTECH PTE. LTD. U3 INFOTECH (U3) offers a complete range of Software Services, Business Solutions and Project Management Outsourcing and Project Management Training. We have an excellent domain expertise in business verticals such as Banking and Financial Services, Insurance, Semiconductors, Healthcare Services, Supply Chain, and Technology. U3 has diversified experience and domain expertise across industries and skill sets, on various technology platforms backed by matured delivery capability, project and program management methodology and strong commitment to serve our clients. U3 Infotech is rapidly growing to establish itself as a professional services and business-consulting provider, working with few of the biggest named customers across various industry segments.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About the Role
U3 Infotech is expanding its team in the Search space across various business verticals. Are you an ambitious person with a vison to build a meaningful career in the recruitment industry then here is a great opportunity for you! This role gives you an opportunity to explore the entrepreneur in you and develop a business vertical.
You will work closely with companies & clients to understand their goals for the year and partner with them to provide the right talents and just in time solutions.

Roles & Responsibilities :
Managing recruitment of as per the demand of the organization and clients.
Leading a regional team focused on delivering across functions with a focus on Technology and Engineering.
Providing excellent service and building strong relationships with clients and stakeholders.
Advising on recruitment strategy and innovative sourcing techniques.
Managing vendor relationships and keeping abreast of the market.
Source applicants, screen resumes, interview, and assess candidates to provide qualified candidates to hiring managers.
Facilitate feedback to key stakeholders to ensure timely production of appropriate documentation and approval.
Negotiate candidate offers, research markets and peer organizations, and provide stakeholders with market data and activity information.
Must have experience in the same domain and industry .

title: Account Manager
company_info: POPPER ASIA is an award-winning Brand Activation Agency with deep experience in Asia. For over a decade, our affiliated companies in Singapore and China together with our strategic partner in Vietnam have delivered creative Brand Design, Marketing Activation, Experiential Events and Digital Engagement across the region. As a creative agency, we help brands pop by delivering uniquely Emmersive™ brand design, marketing activations, experiential events and digital engagement – that leverage on Emerging Technology and Immersive Content supported by actionable data.
address: TANGLIN HALT INDUSTRIAL ESTATE, 115A COMMONWEALTH DRIVE 149596
job_category: Advertising / Media, Entertainment, Events / Promotions, General Management, Marketing / Public Relations
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Who We Are
POPPER ASIA - Singapore’s Award-Winning Creative Agency. We put every work through a “Storytelling Methodology”, winning many hearts with our Creativity & Marketing touch. We’ve garnered many success stories through our expertise in 360º Branding & Activation campaigns across Singapore & Asia.

You will support the team across multiple projects – each with their own set of deliverables and objectives. You will receive broad exposure to a variety of clients in different industries, assisting with various tasks on each.

In general, typical duties that you will be tasked with include:

Project Management:
- Manage projects from start to finish with the support of your managers, including management of budget and comms with clients and other stakeholders

Logistics:
- An administrative approach and an understanding of BTL events and online events is essential to this role

Build Strong Relationships with Internal Teams:
- Communicating with creative team and other external agency partners (digital, media, production, tech)

Vendor Management:
- Overseeing relationships with 3rd party partners, booking/ordering equipment and supplies needed for our events, creating, and maintaining documents tracking timelines and budgets, processing and tracking invoices and payments

Presentations/Decks:
- Leading or assisting with creation of PowerPoint presentations used as pitch proposals, event recaps, or other deliverables for clients

Research & Strategy:
- Assisting with pitch process by contributing to brainstorms, concept ideation, industry trends/competitive research, and sourcing assets


Requirements:
- Organized, outgoing, independent and responsible.
- At least 4-5 years of relevant experience.
- A team Player who works well with cross-functional teams (creative, production, finance, etc.)
- Has a strong work ethic, thrives in a fun loving environment, enjoy creating great event engagements for our clients.
- Excellent organizational skills with the ability to prioritize and self-manage commitments.
- Customer focus, interpersonal and written communication skills

How to apply:
Send your application to: alexandra.stewart@popperasia.com
